title: Organize Events with Ease and Professionalism
sub_title: Create, manage, and participate in events with friends, family, or teams. All on a single modern platform.

card1.title: Easy Management
card1.desc: Organize events effortlessly with intuitive tools.

card2.title: Unique Invitations
card2.desc: Send exclusive links and codes to control who attends.

card3.title: Real-Time Statistics
card3.desc: Get instant insights on attendees and event management.

card2.title: Premium
card2.desc: Unlimited events, advanced customization, and more.

card1.text: Incredible platform, organizing events has never been so easy.

card2.text: The premium plan is great, highly recommended.

FAQ1.question: Can I create events for free?
FAQ1.answer: Yes, with the free plan you can create events at no cost.

FAQ2.question: How do invitations work?
FAQ2.answer: You can send unique invitations so participants can easily join.

FAQ3.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
FAQ3.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan and enjoy extra benefits 2 days a month.
